DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study, is to assess the prevalence of metabolic syndrome in Italy on a regional basis, defined according to National Cholesterol Education Program/Adult Treatment Panel III (NCEP/ATPIII) guidelines criteria.
DOC.brief_title: Regional Observation of the Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Laboratory analysis (lipidic profile and glycemia) performed in the last year Subjects with serious or unstable medical or psychological conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, would compromise the subject's successful participation in the study Pregnancy or breast feeding Patients enrolled in clinical studies which the aim is to evaluate the efficacy and/or tolerability of antihypertensive and/or lipid lowering drugs
